org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction

Class TransactionEventObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction.TransactionEventObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TransactionEventObject
extends java.util.EventObject
    an EventObject for Transaction events. The source is the TransactionManager that managed the transaction.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
